class.name: ocgd_brep_writer
class.brief_description: OpenCASCADE BREP file writer for exporting native CAD geometry.
class.description:
The [ocgd_brep_writer] class provides functionality to write OpenCASCADE shapes to BREP (Boundary Representation) files, which are the native format for OpenCASCADE geometry. BREP files preserve the exact mathematical representation of 3D shapes with full precision.
This writer supports exporting single shapes, multiple shapes as compounds, and provides extensive configuration options for precision, data inclusion, and format settings. It can write to files or generate string content for embedded applications.
BREP format is ideal for preserving precise engineering data and ensuring compatibility with other OpenCASCADE-based applications.

method.name: add_export_comment
method.description: Adds a comment to be included in the exported BREP file for documentation purposes.

method.name: can_export_shape_type
method.description: Checks if the specified shape type can be exported to BREP format. BREP supports all OpenCASCADE shape types.

method.name: clear_error
method.description: Clears any stored error message from the last export operation.

method.name: clear_export_comments
method.description: Removes all previously added export comments.

method.name: get_binary_format
method.description: Returns whether binary format is enabled for BREP export. Binary format is more compact but less readable.

method.name: get_brep_version
method.description: Returns the BREP format version used for export.

method.name: get_compress_output
method.description: Returns whether output compression is enabled to reduce file size.

method.name: get_export_file_size
method.description: Returns the size of the last exported file in bytes. Only available after a successful export operation.

method.name: get_export_info
method.description: Returns comprehensive information about the writer configuration and last export operation.

method.name: get_export_metadata
method.description: Returns the metadata dictionary that will be included in exported files.

method.name: get_export_progress
method.description: Returns the progress of the current export operation as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.

method.name: get_export_statistics
method.description: Returns detailed statistics about the last export operation including timing and performance metrics.

method.name: get_exported_shape_count
method.description: Returns the number of shapes that were exported in the last operation.

method.name: get_fix_shapes_before_export
method.description: Returns whether automatic shape fixing is enabled before export to repair invalid geometry.

method.name: get_last_error
method.description: Returns the last error message from an export operation, or an empty string if no error occurred.

method.name: get_memory_limit
method.description: Returns the memory limit in megabytes for export operations. Zero means no limit.

method.name: get_merge_vertices
method.description: Returns whether nearby vertices are merged before export to reduce geometric complexity.

method.name: get_precision_tolerance
method.description: Returns the precision tolerance used for geometric operations during export.

method.name: get_progress_callback_enabled
method.description: Returns whether progress callbacks are enabled for long-running export operations.

method.name: get_recommended_version
method.description: Returns the recommended BREP format version for best compatibility and features.

method.name: get_remove_duplicates
method.description: Returns whether duplicate geometric elements are removed before export.

method.name: get_shape_optimization
method.description: Returns whether shape optimization is enabled to improve export performance and file size.

method.name: get_shape_quality_report
method.description: Analyzes the quality of a shape and returns a detailed report including potential issues and recommendations.

method.name: get_streaming_mode
method.description: Returns whether streaming mode is enabled for memory-efficient export of large shapes.

method.name: get_supported_brep_versions
method.description: Returns an array of supported BREP format versions for export.

method.name: get_supported_extensions
method.description: Returns an array of supported file extensions for BREP export (typically ["brep", "brp"]).

method.name: get_supported_shape_types
method.description: Returns an array of OpenCASCADE shape types that can be exported to BREP format.

method.name: get_type
method.description: Returns the type identifier of this writer ("ocgd_brep_writer").

method.name: get_write_curves
method.description: Returns whether curve information is included in BREP export. Curves are essential for edge representation.

method.name: get_write_surfaces
method.description: Returns whether surface information is included in BREP export. Surfaces are essential for face representation.

method.name: get_write_triangulation
method.description: Returns whether triangulation data is included in BREP export. Triangulation improves display performance.

method.name: has_error
method.description: Returns true if an error occurred during the last export operation.

method.name: is_null
method.description: Returns whether this writer instance is in a null/invalid state.

method.name: is_version_compatible
method.description: Checks if the specified BREP format version is supported for export.

method.name: new_writer
method.description: Creates and returns a new BREP writer instance. This is the preferred way to create a writer since GDExtensions don't support non-empty constructors.

method.name: perform_shape_check_before_export
method.description: Performs comprehensive validation checks on a shape before export. Returns true if the shape is suitable for export.

method.name: repair_shape_for_export
method.description: Attempts to repair a shape to make it suitable for export. Returns true if repairs were successful.

method.name: set_binary_format
method.description: Enables or disables binary format for BREP export. Binary format is more compact but less human-readable.

method.name: set_brep_version
method.description: Sets the BREP format version to use for export. Use get_supported_brep_versions() to see available options.

method.name: set_compress_output
method.description: Enables or disables output compression to reduce file size at the cost of export time.

method.name: set_export_metadata
method.description: Sets metadata information to be included in exported BREP files for documentation and tracking purposes.

method.name: set_fix_shapes_before_export
method.description: Enables or disables automatic shape fixing before export to repair invalid geometry.

method.name: set_memory_limit
method.description: Sets the memory limit in megabytes for export operations. Set to 0 for no limit.

method.name: set_merge_vertices
method.description: Enables or disables merging of nearby vertices before export to reduce geometric complexity.

method.name: set_precision_tolerance
method.description: Sets the precision tolerance for geometric operations during export. Smaller values provide higher precision.

method.name: set_progress_callback_enabled
method.description: Enables or disables progress callbacks for long-running export operations.

method.name: set_remove_duplicates
method.description: Enables or disables removal of duplicate geometric elements before export.

method.name: set_shape_optimization
method.description: Enables or disables shape optimization to improve export performance and reduce file size.

method.name: set_streaming_mode
method.description: Enables or disables streaming mode for memory-efficient export of large shapes.

method.name: set_write_curves
method.description: Enables or disables inclusion of curve information in BREP export. Required for precise edge representation.

method.name: set_write_surfaces
method.description: Enables or disables inclusion of surface information in BREP export. Required for precise face representation.

method.name: set_write_triangulation
method.description: Enables or disables inclusion of triangulation data in BREP export. Improves display performance but increases file size.

method.name: validate_shape_for_export
method.description: Validates whether a shape is suitable for BREP export. Returns true if the shape can be exported successfully.

method.name: validate_shapes_for_export
method.description: Validates whether an array of shapes are all suitable for BREP export. Returns true if all shapes can be exported.

method.name: write_assembly_as_separate_files
method.description: Exports each component of an assembly as separate BREP files with names based on the base path.

method.name: write_file
method.description: Writes a single shape to a BREP file at the specified path. Returns true on success, false on failure.

method.name: write_file_with_options
method.description: Writes a single shape to a BREP file with custom export options. The options dictionary can override default settings.

method.name: write_multiple_files
method.description: Exports multiple shapes to separate BREP files. The shapes and file_paths arrays must have the same length.

method.name: write_shapes
method.description: Writes multiple shapes as a compound to a single BREP file. Returns true on success, false on failure.

method.name: write_shapes_to_string
method.description: Converts multiple shapes to BREP format and returns the result as a string. Shapes are combined into a compound.

method.name: write_shapes_with_options
method.description: Writes multiple shapes as a compound to a BREP file with custom export options.

method.name: write_to_string
method.description: Converts a shape to BREP format and returns the result as a string instead of writing to a file.
